tool_description: Api for Paperlit digital publishing platform
name: Paperlit
title: Paperlit

api_list.name: Push
api_list.description: get Push

api_list.name: List Projects
api_list.description: Projects that the user has access to
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paperlit.p.rapidapi.com/v8/projects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paperlit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://paperlit.p.rapidapi.com/v8/projects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paperlit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Project
api_list.description: Retrieve information about the specific project

api_list.name: List Publications
api_list.description: List of publications included in the specified project

api_list.name: List Project's Issues
api_list.description: List of issues between all project's publications

api_list.name: Publication
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific publication

api_list.name: Issue
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific issue

api_list.name: List Publication's Issues
api_list.description: List of publication's issues

api_list.name: Obtain Issue with Variants
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific issue with related variants

api_list.name: List Channels
api_list.description: List of feed channels

api_list.name: Channel
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific channel

api_list.name: List Channel Items
api_list.description: Retrieve list of items in the specific channel. Items are chronologically sorted. The result contains only the items directly related to the channel. It means that for node items, their children are not returned

api_list.name: List Children Items
api_list.description: List of items that are children of the specific item

api_list.name: List Source Feeds
api_list.description: List of source feeds set in the specified channel

api_list.name: Build Settings
api_list.description: List of settings to use for building an app. Only administrator can expand the api with build settings. Without the build parameter are returned a subset of these settings

api_list.name: List Variant Assets
api_list.description: List all Assets of a specific Variant of a specific Issue

api_list.name: List Transactions
api_list.description: User's transactions between all stores

api_list.name: List Subscriptions
api_list.description: List of subscription products

api_list.name: Audio
List Audios
Audio SAS
List Projects for User
Search
api_list.description: Pdf text search

api_list.name: Get Transactions
api_list.description: Get the user transactions

required_parameters.name: paperlitid
required_parameters.description: the id retrieved form the login app account call

api_list.name: List Transactions by deviceId
api_list.description: Transactions based on device id specifications

api_list.name: Obtain Single Page
api_list.description: Retrieves a single page of the specified issue variant
